DaysTalkingAboutEvent.Description: By default, after the trick or treat event, the villagers will talk about it for 7 days. If you'd like to reduce how long people talk about the event for, or make them talk about it even longer, you can! You can select a number between 1 day and 28 days for the days people will talk about the event.
